resources.string: This app shows you a good view of all your WhatsApp and WhatsApp business contacts status and helps you save them permanently. \n You can view the pictures and videos separately, then simply tap the ones you want to save, then click the save button. Even if you leave the pictures page to the video page, your selection is still maintained. You can also swipe up to refresh the list. To view the image clearly, just hold on it. This is cool, right? Do not forget to share this app. To close the floating button, just drag it to the bottom of the screen. Awesome!

This app helps you view and save your contacts WhatsApp and WhatsApp business status to your phone, including video, pictures, gifs. Download it here https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.hashcode.whatsstatussaver , developed by HashCode
